TextBody:
Hello Sai,

Before we can proceed further with the case, can you please provide us the following information:
•        What is the impact of the issue on your business?
•        Who is affected by this issue?
•        What are the steps to reproduce?
•        Have you attempted any troubleshooting steps yet? If so, what have you tried?
•        What are you trying to do or accomplish?
•        When did this issue start?
•       Screen shots, logs, other artifacts, etc.

Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com

Subject: RE: Predefined polices are not working ||NOVOPAY-25032025||    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0NJ08j:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000NJ08j:ref

Dear Team,

Please find the below answers for your queries.

*        What is the impact of the issue on your business? It will not affect our business, we are in POC pace, we are testing the sensitive contents and predefined contents but it is not blocking
*        Who is affected by this issue? All the clients
*        What are the steps to reproduce? We have created new policies and tested it is not working, only the PAN card PNG was blocking but JPG was not blocking, we have tried multiple ways but it's not workout
*        Have you attempted any troubleshooting steps yet? If so, what have you tried? Yes if we selected file types that time should be blocked, but customer don't want to block files type they want to block only PII and SSN datas.
*        What are you trying to do or accomplish? We are trying to block predefined contents.
*        When did this issue start? Last week onwards.

In case of any queries feel free to call or email.
Thanks & Regards,
